timeline.bodyText: This is called by CLI when using tools to add/remove UES or set/remove their attributes. We should check, if user (SELF) can call these methods and if yes, we should enable SELF role in this methods policy.
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.bodyText: I believe we should allow also SELF on Member/User in this methods policy.
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.bodyText: A would allow this method for FACILITYADMIN too. They probably use version with RichResource from GUI, but its not consistent with expected logic that facility admin can retrieve resources of his facility (by any identifier).
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.bodyText: Its strange, that this method is not allowed for facility admins (same for ByName version), but facility admins can retrieve all services together. We should allow it for them in both methods.
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.bodyText: Same goes for all methods working with service packages, since facility admin is the one to get/assign service packages to the facility and perun admin manages those packages.
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.message:
Fix invalid entry calls

* There were some methods that didn't call directly entry layer but
instead, they called methods from ApiCaller which are for a different
purpose. Because of that in the entry layer, there was an invalid
Principal.
* Added role SELF to policy for the `getGroupById` method because after
this fix, group members would not be able to call this method.
